warning(options)

[Source]

    # File lib/eschaton/deprecation.rb, line 17
17:     def self.warning(options)
18:       options = {:message => options} if options.is_a?(String)
19:       options.default! :include_called_from => true
20: 
21:       if self.enabled?
22:         message = "Eschaton deprecation warning: #{options[:message]}."
23:         message+= "Called from #{self.get_caller(caller)}" if options[:include_called_from].true?
24: 
25:         $stderr.puts message
26:       end
27:     end

Protected Class methods

get_caller(call_stack)

[Source]

    # File lib/eschaton/deprecation.rb, line 30
30:       def self.get_caller(call_stack)
31:         framework_call_pattarn = /ruby|actionmailer|actionpack|activerecord|activeresource|activesupport|railties/
32:         applcation_calls = call_stack.reject! do |call|
33:                              call =~ framework_call_pattarn
34:                            end
35: 
36:         applcation_calls[1].gsub(RAILS_ROOT, '')
37:       end
